official_title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund.

summary.text: Amends the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund from FY 1987 to 1992.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Historic Preservation Act to extend the authorization for the Historic Preservation Fund.
